attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.text: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Mind Jack
attacks.text: Does 20 more damage for each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fearsome Shadow
attacks.text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Dragon Slayer
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon is a Dragon Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

cards.name: Tornadus-EX
text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Windfall
attacks.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Then, draw 6 cards.

attacks.text: Does 30 more damage for each Plasma Energy attached to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Bright Down
ability.text: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to this Pokémon by your opponent's Pokémon with Abilities.

text: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Barrier Break
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

cards.name: Professor Juniper
text: Discard your hand and draw 7 cards.

cards.name: Ghetsis
text: Your opponent reveals his or her hand and shuffles all Item cards found there into his or her deck. Then, draw a number of cards equal to the number of Item cards your opponent shuffled into his or her deck.

ability.name: Diving Draw
ability.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Attack Command
attacks.text: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's).

cards.name: Max Potion
text: Heal all damage from 1 of your Pokémon. Then, discard all Energy attached to that Pokémon.

cards.name: Ultra Ball
text: Discard 2 cards from your hand. (If you can't discard 2 cards, you can't play this card.) Search your deck for a Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Swift Sting
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has full HP, this attack does 40 more damage, and the Defending Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
